618775251.name: Beautiful cathedral
618775251.author: a TripAdvisor user
618775251.reviewBody: I visited the cathedral on a Saturday morning. It was very hot also I just sat outside and soaked in the atmosphere. It was nice and quiet which I enjoyed. This is a must see when travelling to Hermosillo!

568156348.name: Center of Typical Plaza
568156348.author: a TripAdvisor user
568156348.reviewBody: This cathedral is quite beautiful and is surround by a typical Mexican square with vendors and families.  A nice walk on a sunny afternoon soaking up the culture and appreciating the architecture of the impressive cathedral.

562336866.name: Beautiful Inside and Out
562336866.author: a TripAdvisor user
562336866.reviewBody:
We were lucky enough to be in Hermosillo on Ash Wednesday and got our ashes at this gorgeous cathedral. There were long lines and I was surprised when I got to the front. Instead of making a cross on my forehead with the ashes as done in our church, the ashes were sprinkled into my scalp. Very unique.

Architecturally this is a photographer's paradise and the outside was especially stunning at night with the bell towers lit. It was interesting to learn that the cathedral's cupola was not completed until 1963 though construction of the cathedral was begun in 1887 and it was dedicated in 1902.

While visiting the Hermosillo Cathedral, which is actually called the Cathedral of the Assumption, don't miss the stunning gazebo in the park directly in front.

The Lutisuc Gallery, which sells high-quality indigenous art, and the municipal building, filled with exceptional murals, are both nearby.

504553312.name: The Square and The Cathedral is a symbol the city
504553312.author: a TripAdvisor user
504553312.reviewBody: A place to admire, the architecture. This is the spot of the city for having a walk with the felling ot the Mexican Culture as in the old cities south of Mexico

472490517.name: LARGE, BUT SIMPLE CATHEDRAL
472490517.author: a TripAdvisor user
472490517.reviewBody: Take a few minutes while touring the old city center and enter the church to experience local culture

465917562.name: Great  spot to just  walk  around
465917562.author: a TripAdvisor user
465917562.reviewBody: Took  a walk around the centre  of hermosillo  took  in the  people and the  old  buildings  like the church  love  old churches

463802472.name: Glorious and beautiful
463802472.author: a TripAdvisor user
463802472.reviewBody: Beautiful church. Learned many things about Catedral de la Asuncion, which is the correct name. Nice park for a relax afternoon and there are some bars around on the historic area. Impresive place. if you like these type of art, you must visit too Nuestra Se\u00f1ora de Fatima church which is about three miles north.

458506169.name: Beautiful church
458506169.author: a TripAdvisor user
458506169.reviewBody: Inside its more beautiful than outside. You can walk around visit some more places near by in front of Judicial office.

449916106.name: Beautiful place to visit
449916106.author: a TripAdvisor user
449916106.reviewBody: Outside the cathedral you can find the city square with shoe shine, street vendors for souvenirs, street food and great people watching. If you are in Hermosillo this is a nice thing to do in the evening with your family.  A very Mexican experience with nice people watching.

449055883.name: Very lighted at night
449055883.author: a TripAdvisor user
449055883.reviewBody: Very lighted, lots of food wagons, lots of families walking having\na good time. Great place for kids

405128427.name: Beautiful architecture of the past
405128427.author: a TripAdvisor user
405128427.reviewBody: This church is so beautiful outside and inside. It demands your full attention and prayer.\nThe cuppola is awe-inpireing. So majestic.

545803786.name: Amazing!
545803786.author: a TripAdvisor user
545803786.reviewBody:
I wasn't expecting much from this place, since it does not have much marketing.

I was there on a Thursday at 1 pm, so it was almost empty, just a few more visitors there.

There is a good and wide selection of animals and fortunately you can see them all.

It is a long way to complete the whole park, but it is worth the while. 

I recommend sun block or an umbrella, it might be too sunny there.

I would only ask that they put more signs and directions in the park.

489615521.name: Desert Animals DO THE SAFARI
489615521.author: a TripAdvisor user
489615521.reviewBody: UPCLOSE and I mean you can pet a zebra. lots of cool snakes and desert animals, cactus, nice walk. No english but still nice way yo spend a morning. Get there before the sun warms up ( around 2pm) bring a hat and snacks.

397052492.name: Excellent workout
397052492.author: a TripAdvisor user
397052492.reviewBody: If you cometo see a lot of animals you will be dissapinted, however, it seems like they are trying to improve everything. Things were in better shape and there were a little more animals than last time I went.\nThe Safari was really fun, but be careful with ostriches!

286732350.name: Only place in Sonora to see some animals.
286732350.author: a TripAdvisor user
286732350.reviewBody: Safari was good, but every cages in the park... no animals.  Fish tanks ... empty. It should be more clean and should have more animals...

277650390.name: Somehow good, not excelle worth the price it might take ours or the whole day, depending on your schedule.
277650390.author: a TripAdvisor user
277650390.reviewBody: Went with the wife and the kid, had a very good time on the Safari, animals are very separated one of the others, maintenance seems to be completely absent, some animals even seem to suffer. The hard seats on the safari trip worth the payment and feeding "Pancho" the giraffe was a great experience for us and the kid since Pancho grabs the food when you are not offering it and surprised a bunch of kids. The rest of the safari included hyenas, turtles, lions, ostriches and a bunch of African animals right out side the cart.

191828816.name: A punto de cerrar sin presupuesto
191828816.author: a TripAdvisor user
191828816.reviewBody: About to close no budget thanks to the gobernor, if you decide to visit you"ll gonna be able to see how the faccilities are in deplorable conditions, most of the animals had died or luckyli removed to other places, is very sad to see a place that has been here for several years it is in this conditions right now.

156081683.name: we had fun!
156081683.author: a TripAdvisor user
156081683.reviewBody: nos divertimos mucho :) we\'ll be going back in the next year or so. They had a lot of animals, lions, tigers, hippo, monkey, array of birds...etc

675723521.name: Mejor Lugar de Hermosillo
675723521.author: a TripAdvisor user
675723521.reviewBody: Live Music, Great Drinks, Amazing Park highly recommended. The service is very friendly. Great place for family

667239045.name: Late night meal
667239045.author: a TripAdvisor user
667239045.reviewBody: A good variety of food and fast service makes this place a wonderful place to stop and enjoy mexico\'s great cuisine.

643340140.name: A lot of options.
643340140.author: a TripAdvisor user
643340140.reviewBody: This is a good place to go with you friends and family, as long as the weather is good, summers in Hermosillo are extremly hot. \n\nThis place have a big variety of food trucks with a really good authentic or international food.

631496338.name: A good familiar place, food truck style
631496338.author: a TripAdvisor user
631496338.reviewBody: There are several food options, most of them fast food, there is a bar, a huge parking lot available

603564698.name: Options
603564698.author: a TripAdvisor user
603564698.reviewBody: Good place to go when you are not sure what to eat!!! Good location, good place to get a few drinks and food and sometimes there is musice live...  only at night though, \'cause is hot outside!!!

597664232.name: The most upbeat place in town
597664232.author: a TripAdvisor user
597664232.reviewBody: As the evening began to cool with a refreshing breeze, we wandered amongst the tempting food trucks and settled on one that offered healthy, vegetarian food, something verde. We enjoyed great service, and even better food. The local band was playing on a stage just behind our table. They did an amazing rendition of old rock, blues and country hits. Absolutely not amateurish!\nWe\u2019re definitely going back to Parque la Ruina tonight!

591053674.name: Highlight of Hermosillo
591053674.author: a TripAdvisor user
591053674.reviewBody: This place was easily one of the best spent evenings of our trip to Mexico. It\u2019s got a great vibe with such a pretty atmosphere in the evenings. We didn\u2019t eat here but next time will make sure to allow room to try the food trucks. Enjoyable and varied live music and excellent selection of drinks. They sell (good) wine too, which is sometimes hard to find in Mexico outside of supermarkets when you go out.

590913414.name: Food trucks live music !
590913414.author: a TripAdvisor user
590913414.reviewBody: Hermosillo has embraced the night culture with this new area. It\'s cool, clean and safe. A variety of fun food and live music make it a great place to soak up the desert heat under beautiful twinkle lights and open sky. The ambient is great for friends , families or a fun date. Can\'t wait to go back and try more food.

586210119.name: Wonderful place to enjoy your evening!
586210119.author: a TripAdvisor user
586210119.reviewBody: We went here after some drinks at the bar. There were a bunch of delicious food trucks, there was live music, they served beers, Harry Potter was playing, babies were dancing, and we had a lovely time chatting. I\u2019d highly recommend the churros and paletas!

579756951.name: Just walking around ...
579756951.author: a TripAdvisor user
579756951.reviewBody: This place is very family oriented and a nice place to visit... I would say that everyone should go at least to check it out... diversity of foods can be found, you can drink in some establishments and spend a good time while walking around... it is something different that is worth it ...

560564030.name: Laid back fun!
560564030.author: a TripAdvisor user
560564030.reviewBody: Excellent service and a great band at the bar, clean restrooms, and yummy BBQ made for an enjoyable night out with friends. Who knew we could have this much fun on a Wednesday night?

548440233.name: great place to hang with friends and family
548440233.author: a TripAdvisor user
548440233.reviewBody: I love this place, everybody cam eat their favorite food, lots of food trucks. They even offer beer and wine in certain areas. Also for the adults they have a cool bar in the back of the park. Some day they have live music. Overall an easy and fun place to eat and have fun. Great for all ages!

547073087.name: Great place to relax
547073087.author: a TripAdvisor user
547073087.reviewBody: It is a great place to eat, drink or just hang out with family or friends, a lot of variety, some times there is live music or cultural events.

540035994.name: FOOD TRUCKS
540035994.author: a TripAdvisor user
540035994.reviewBody: Fun place full of food trucks and good music!\nFun place full of food trucks and good music!\nFun place full of food trucks and good music!

530010932.name: Nice place for informal dinner
530010932.author: a TripAdvisor user
530010932.reviewBody: Very nice and family oriented place, worth to visit while in Hermosillo. Food trucks all the time and music on weekends

522449603.name: great place to visit at night for some music and food
522449603.author: a TripAdvisor user
522449603.reviewBody: A lot of people come here and there is a variety of food trucks serving from pizza to tacos and tasty desserts.\n\n

487671357.name: Good option for different food
487671357.author: a TripAdvisor user
487671357.reviewBody: Basically its a food truck concept and they have around 20 food trucks which are offering different kind of food..they have planty of options for everybody to choose from.. and ambience is also very nice...its worth going to this place..

486696898.name: Nice outdoor bar
486696898.author: a TripAdvisor user
486696898.reviewBody: Has a great and relaxed athmosphere, live music in the bar and lots of food options. People of all ages.

483304978.name: Good food and great music
483304978.author: a TripAdvisor user
483304978.reviewBody: I went on a Sunday evening and ate some pasta (Penne a la Diabla) and my friend had sushi.  We had to wait for about half an hour for our food (in a way it is not very convenient for food coming out of a food truck) but all of the food trucks there had a line or were pretty busy, so no big deal.  The food was delicious and while we were there, they had live music which sounded amazing!  There is plenty of parking space and it was a great way to end my trip.

475533126.name: Family Time
475533126.author: a TripAdvisor user
475533126.reviewBody: I went to this park with my two kids, it\'s an excellent concept of food trucks and a few attractions for the little ones, you can go to this place just with your couple or with your kids either way you will have a great moment, they have a pretty good environment, thanks to SONORA for having these places.

465580222.name: Love it!
465580222.author: a TripAdvisor user
465580222.reviewBody: This place has something for everyone.  There are about a dozen food trucks serving hotdogs to steak with everything in between.  The lasagna at Bucatini is the best I\'ve had in Hermosillo.  They have live music on the weekends!  Parking is easy and their is a great playground for children.  They finally added some small dessert places as well.

460133610.name: Great food corridor
460133610.author: a TripAdvisor user
460133610.reviewBody: Very nice atmosphere. Lots of food trucks for good Hermosillo food. Live music groups are also great, varying from classic rock to jazz (my favorite). You can visit any day of the week!

458580687.name: Best food tucks :D
458580687.author: a TripAdvisor user
458580687.reviewBody: I have been at parque la ruina several times. All the times the experience was great. It has different food trucks where you can eat different type of food. All different food trucks i tried were excellent. It also has a part where they sell craft beer, and they are delicious. The atmosphere there it is also excellent mainly when there is life music. High recommend place if you want to enjoy great food in a excellent atmosphere.

452752371.name: Innovative place, average taste even do they have a wide selection.
452752371.author: a TripAdvisor user
452752371.reviewBody: The most attractive place in Hermosillo for dinner. Good parking, good mood but the taste in several food trucks is more likely average. I was expecting more about the turkey legs or the asian food. Prices are like any other place not  in a food truck. Expectations were higher.

452656709.name: The most refreshing experience you will know
452656709.author: a TripAdvisor user
452656709.reviewBody: this food truck park has you will enjoy of a vintage atmosphere since the very beginning since its situated in what used to be an old mill part of the history of Hermosillo  , the food is very rich , the booze its very good and the top of the cherry is the music the amazing bands that play live at the bar every night.

448374749.name: Food Truck Culture has arrived!
448374749.author: a TripAdvisor user
448374749.reviewBody: The food truck park, as a concept, is relatively new to Hermosillo. We love it! La Ruina has a lot of spectacular options for food in an environment that is really comfortable. The tables are huge and abundant, which makes this a really great location for large groups and/or large families. They regularly have live music playing which just adds to the enjoyable ambiance. \n\nLa Ruina is really clean with a nice layout, but what really makes this place spectacular is the available parking. When this place gets packed (and that\'s often), there is still always room for parking. Rarely does one EVER find adequate parking in Hermosillo, so this is pure magic.

448147909.name: A must visit in Hermosillo
448147909.author: a TripAdvisor user
448147909.reviewBody: Really a great place. Love the concept. So many options of food with a great atmosphere. The live music, bar and ambiance was fantastic. It\'s definitely not just a bunch of food trucks parked in a circle. They did it right with tons of space and a great setting.\nI will go back again and again, I want to try every food truck.\n\ud83d\udc4d\ud83c\udffc\ud83d\udc4d\ud83c\udffc

445507457.name: Love the concept!
445507457.author: a TripAdvisor user
445507457.reviewBody: I think this food truck park is becoming a must see in Hermosillo. Enjoy a laid back meal with friends, with many options from Asian stir fry, to Italian, BBQ, and even Paella. You\'ll love to visit this place as a couple, with friends, family and/or kids. There\'s also a very cool outdoor bar that often has live music and generally easy access to beer at the park.

436677498.name: Food Truck Heaven
436677498.author: a TripAdvisor user
436677498.reviewBody: Parque La Ruina, an outdoor dining experience, is Heaven for (no fuzz) Foodies!  There are around 15 food trucks to choose from and the type of dishes  range from chilli cheese fries to paellas.  I tried dishes from multiples vendors and all were delicious. The cost is as expected for good food served without frills.  The \u00f1ark is clean and has retained it\'s character of when it was an Hacienda with original exposed walls huge trees that I\'m sure provide great shade in the summer.  If you visit Hermosillo you MUST check out La Ruina!

429282018.name: Our favorite Friday night place
429282018.author: a TripAdvisor user
429282018.reviewBody: The atmosphere here is great.  The variety of food is perfect for any group.  We love that he can get Chinese and I can get Italian, or whatever we\'re in the mood for.  They put in a new playground and the kids can move around so it\'s great for families with young children.  Prices are very reasonable and all the food we\'ve had has been excellent.  There is live music some nights too.

647261394.name: Shopping
647261394.author: a TripAdvisor user
647261394.reviewBody: Is a medium size mall, however it has everything you might want, restaurants, kids places, even movie theater. Stores and boutiques, it was recently expanded adding new brands.

address.streetAddress: Blvd. Cultura Ote. # 55 Col. Proyecto Rio Sonora

612559034.name: It\u2019s a mall.
612559034.author: a TripAdvisor user
612559034.reviewBody: It\u2019s ok.  Good place to pick up what you need.  And the food court is ok.  But not much more to say about it.   Some local handicrafts but limited selection.

address.streetAddress: Blvd. Cultura Ote. # 55 Col. Proyecto Rio Sonora

611037508.name: Looking for a place to chill
611037508.author: a TripAdvisor user
611037508.reviewBody: Galerias Mall is the cool place in Hermosillo. Over the last few years, more shops have opened, and the variety in nearly on par with Canadian or US malls. The food court features classics like McDonald\u2019s, as well as local fare, like Las Chulas Express. Comicx is a full service restaurant that echos the restaurants usually found north of the border. Their beer is cold, and the wings spicy, so no complaints from me. \nCin\u00e9polis cinema has a cool VIP theatre, where you can see the latest releases in a comfy chair. \nAll in all, it\u2019s a decent mall, where a casual afternoon will pass by quickly.

address.streetAddress: Blvd. Cultura Ote. # 55 Col. Proyecto Rio Sonora

548589948.name: Poor
548589948.author: a TripAdvisor user
548589948.reviewBody: Extremely poor quality clothing out of date of of style, VERY expensive.\nA pair o shoes in Galerias sells for 1130 pesos you can get the same counterfit shoe in Centro Hermosillo for 317 pesos.

address.streetAddress: Blvd. Cultura Ote. # 55 Col. Proyecto Rio Sonora

530290411.name: Sunday stroll
530290411.author: a TripAdvisor user
530290411.reviewBody: Went here to buy I few thing we forgotten on our way to San Carlos . we got lunch and did a little shop . they have a lot of restaurants and shops. I would recommended this place.

address.streetAddress: Blvd. Cultura Ote. # 55 Col. Proyecto Rio Sonora

485877774.name: Good to goof around
485877774.author: a TripAdvisor user
485877774.reviewBody: One of the major malls in town. Close from hotels and restaurants. Not a place if you are looking for a hair salon for hers but they do have a barber shop ;). Clean areas.

address.streetAddress: Blvd. Cultura Ote. # 55 Col. Proyecto Rio Sonora

462580991.name: Nice New Mall
462580991.author: a TripAdvisor user
462580991.reviewBody: Nice mall that has everything you want from movie theater to food. A good place to walk around and shop as well. Close to our hotel Hampton so really nice.

address.streetAddress: Blvd. Cultura Ote. # 55 Col. Proyecto Rio Sonora

418875550.name: Normal Mall
418875550.author: a TripAdvisor user
418875550.reviewBody: It has what a mall has, nothing extraordinary, nothing horrible, just shops, food and a movie theater.

address.streetAddress: Blvd. Cultura Ote. # 55 Col. Proyecto Rio Sonora

366605248.name: Typical mall
366605248.author: a TripAdvisor user
366605248.reviewBody: This is a typical mall. Nothing interesting. It has the regular stores you find in a mall including food. The movie theater is good.

address.streetAddress: Blvd. Cultura Ote. # 55 Col. Proyecto Rio Sonora

361226831.name: Need a shopping hit?
361226831.author: a TripAdvisor user
361226831.reviewBody: Fancy Sears store with a Pier One section. This is, in my opinion, the nieces shopping mall in Hermosillo. There are good restaurants, classing clothing stores, health food shops, an iShop providing Apple products and service. And it\'s all near the beautiful MUSAS art museum.

address.streetAddress: Blvd. Cultura Ote. # 55 Col. Proyecto Rio Sonora

341331910.name: ok, a mall and ?
341331910.author: a TripAdvisor user
341331910.reviewBody: On a business trip in hermosillo, i looked at the tripadvisor ranking on things to do and I am still searching for the reason of the presence of this mall.\nThis is just ...a mall, with shops, restaurants and cinema..ok for family or friends on a too sunny day but nothing more and specially not for tourism.

address.streetAddress: Blvd. Cultura Ote. # 55 Col. Proyecto Rio Sonora

327943317.name: This is not any sort of touristic or great mall
327943317.author: a TripAdvisor user
327943317.reviewBody: It\'s just a small mall with some well-known boutiques but not much else, it doesn\'t even have much variety, but since it\'s like the only mall here, then it may be the only place with what some need.

address.streetAddress: Blvd. Cultura Ote. # 55 Col. Proyecto Rio Sonora

298791693.name: One of the modern shopping mall in Hermosillo
298791693.author: a TripAdvisor user
298791693.reviewBody: You can do lots of things here, go to movies, go eat at restraunts, enjoy video games, and shop.  You got nothing to do but want to spend time with your family, because this place is Air Conditioned(remember Hermosillo gets 40 degrees celcius or higher).  Only complaint is lack of parking spaces and small parking spaces.  Enjoy!!!

address.streetAddress: Blvd. Cultura Ote. # 55 Col. Proyecto Rio Sonora

293521800.name: Upscale Mall in Hermosiilo
293521800.author: a TripAdvisor user
293521800.reviewBody: Great location, variety of shops, Sears, movie theater and food court in an upscale mall.  Very clean, good parking and security in an easy to find location.

address.streetAddress: Blvd. Cultura Ote. # 55 Col. Proyecto Rio Sonora

259868942.name: Why is this on TripAdvisor?!
259868942.author: a TripAdvisor user
259868942.reviewBody:
My review is written for foreigners that might be visiting Hermosillo. I am including it only because TripAdvisor is listing this little mall as something worthy of your attention. 

If you have been to a mall in the US, then you've already experienced what Galerias Mall has to offer. Except, it is much smaller. And the small array of stores offer things you would find in the US for roughly twice the price. 

Listing this mall as a 'thing to do' would parallel listing a gas station in the US for Mexicans to visit. In other words, there's nothing to do or see here.

address.streetAddress: Blvd. Cultura Ote. # 55 Col. Proyecto Rio Sonora

223482413.name: Nice escape from the heat
223482413.author: a TripAdvisor user
223482413.reviewBody: Good mall to hang out and eat and window shop or pick up a few gifts for the family. I ended up picking up a couple bottles of liquor and bags of Machaca for my family back home.

address.streetAddress: Blvd. Cultura Ote. # 55 Col. Proyecto Rio Sonora

673807984.name: Cerro del Bachoco
673807984.author: a TripAdvisor user
673807984.reviewBody: Excelente lugar para ir a realizar ejercicio extremo, es recomendable llevar ropa c\u00f3moda por la altura del cerro

577277436.name: ideal para senderismo
577277436.author: a TripAdvisor user
577277436.reviewBody: punto de visita para los amantes del deporte, senderismo o  bicicleta. A las orillas de la ciudad. Representa un atractivo y una oportunidad para caminar, correr a simplemente salid de la ciudad un rato. Adem\u00e1s constituye un divertido mirador.

572420059.name: Una vista incre\u00edble!
572420059.author: a TripAdvisor user
572420059.reviewBody: La semana pasada vis\u00edtanos esta joya de Hermosillo. Llegamos a subir el cerro al rededor de las 5, llegamos a la cima 1 hora despu\u00e9s y tipo 7:30 ya est\u00e1bamos abajo. Es recomendado llevar ropa deportiva y tenis c\u00f3modos, mucha agua, bloqueador solar y algo para comer si es necesario recargar bater\u00eda. El cerro cuenta con muchas piedras sueltas y donde solo tiene tierra es a\u00fan m\u00e1s dif\u00edcil escalar. Es una atracci\u00f3n muy popular, as\u00ed que en caso de emergencia siempre hay muchas personas que pueden auxiliar. Si tienes tiempo y buscas un escape de la rutina, este es el mejor lugar, cuenta con una vista incre\u00edble y nada que un poco de aire fresco no pueda solucionar. Es una visita obligada si est\u00e1s en Hermosillo!!!

567587105.name: MUY BUENAS PISTAS DE MTB y HIKING
567587105.author: a TripAdvisor user
567587105.reviewBody: El bachoco es un lugar muy accesible para ir a realizar ejercicios en la ciudad de Hermosillo, facial acceso y con muy buenas pistas para realizar MTB y HIKING, sus cerros de topograf\u00eda accesible y hermosas vistas a la ciudad hacen de los cerros del bachoco un buen lugar para ir a visitar

546934039.name: Escala el cerro del bachoco
546934039.author: a TripAdvisor user
546934039.reviewBody:
Deberás llevar ropa deportiva, ya que es un largo camino y ir con bastante agua.
Recomendado para las personas que hacer ejercicio frecuentemente.
Llevar agua, ya que no hay puestos de venta.
De preferencia ir en la mañana antes de que salga el sol. o cuando se va ocultar ya que la vista es muy buena.

Venden cocos afuera para que vayas preparado.

529057776.name: Relajante caminata
529057776.author: a TripAdvisor user
529057776.reviewBody: Este lugar es id\u00f3neo para ir a ejercitarse o simplemente a una relajante caminata con la familia, amigos o con una mascota ya se a por la ma\u00f1ana o tarde, ofrece una excelente vista de la ciudad y se puede disfrutar de la naturaleza sin salir de la ciudad.

527846547.name: Bachoco
527846547.author: a TripAdvisor user
527846547.reviewBody: Vista muy hermosa de la ciudad un amanecer bonito. Recomendado.hay que ir comodo y con ropa para subir y subir un cerro

508546777.name: Gran vista de la ciudad
508546777.author: a TripAdvisor user
508546777.reviewBody: Imperdible visita si te gusta el hiking o mountain biking, no ocupas ser un experto para subir el cerro a pie, el viaje te puede tomar entre 1 hr a 3 hr (en promedio) depende de tu condici\u00f3n/ritmo , se recomienda ir muy temprano para evitar el calor o por la tarde, llevar agua. La vista en la cima es \u00fanica.\nLe pongo 4 porque a pesar de que se han hecho trabajos comunitarios para limpiar el area , personas siguen tirando basura y en la cima las rocas est\u00e1n llenas de graffiti.\nSi vas no tires basura

652208260.name: cerro de la campana
652208260.author: a TripAdvisor user
652208260.reviewBody: its a good place to visit in hermosillo, because her you can hve a better view of the entire city and the surroundings

646477795.name: Drive slowly and take the time to go up here.
646477795.author: a TripAdvisor user
646477795.reviewBody: This offers an incredible view of this growing city. We went up on a beautiful day and had unlimited visibility in all directions. Well worth it,

643340478.name: Amazing view !!
643340478.author: a TripAdvisor user
643340478.reviewBody: If this is your first time in Hermosillo, you definetly have to visit Cerrro de la Campana. From here you can have a good view of the city, and you can take a some good pictures from here. \n\nThere is a coffe place on top, so you can enjoy a coffe while you are there..

618774599.name: Fantastic views
618774599.author: a TripAdvisor user
618774599.reviewBody: I really enjoyed this walk. The view was absolutely amazing. I did this walk in the morning but would like to do this again in the evening to watch the sun go down. It was an enjoyable walk on my own.

591467249.name: Awesome place
591467249.author: a TripAdvisor user
591467249.reviewBody: Awesome place to visit, won\'t miss the sunset and the breeze wind. Love to see the sunset and the city getting lighten up simultaneously \ud83d\ude0d

579489095.name: Just sightseeing...
579489095.author: a TripAdvisor user
579489095.reviewBody: These place has a nice view ... a place to buy some snacks it is nice spend some time and chat... this is more like a place to take family with children to play around... but go once sun is gone or you will toast yourself:))))

552817418.name: Local landmark
552817418.author: a TripAdvisor user
552817418.reviewBody: Beautiful rock formation. Awesome views from different points in the city of Hermosillo. Majestic and quiet...

500878457.name: nice place to visit for locals and visitors
500878457.author: a TripAdvisor user
500878457.reviewBody: By going to Cerro de la campana, you can have a wonderful view from Hermosillo specially if you go during the sunset or night time. If you visit during summer dont even think about going during day time because from the hot weather you can feel dizzy or sick.

494883896.name: Review of the VIEW
494883896.author: a TripAdvisor user
494883896.reviewBody: This place has cleaned up a bit! Family Friendly! Snack shack!?! Vendors!?! WOW! No more sitting on the wall and dangling one\'s legs over the edge!

490775892.name: Hike
490775892.author: a TripAdvisor user
490775892.reviewBody: We walked up the hill in the evening,  quite nice view. Easy to find, easy walk up but not sure how long. Felt very safe, and it was quite busy at the top. Definitely worth seeing at night.

472491807.name: SMALL MOUNTAIN OVERLOOKING THE CITY WITH IMPRESSIVE VIEWS AT NIGHT
472491807.author: a TripAdvisor user
472491807.reviewBody: We went to the top of the small mountain that overlooks the city during the day--not too exciting. We understand that the best time to visit is at pre-sunset or later in the evening.

471189546.name: Fun
471189546.author: a TripAdvisor user
471189546.reviewBody: Hermosillo\'s Best view of the city is from up the hill. There is a snack bar so you can enjoy a good sunset. Look for the hallow rock that makes the sound that gives this mountain its name (no its not the bell shape, but the bell sound it makes when 2 rocks are banged together)

467080178.name: Nice view of the city and great sunset, but....
467080178.author: a TripAdvisor user
467080178.reviewBody: I recently moved to Hermosillo and the first thing you need to adjust to is the weather! So if you are visiting in the summer months, bring sunglasses, sunscreen and a giant hat cause it gets blistering hot!  On to cerro de la campana!  I am personally more of a city dweller and enjoy architecture over the "great outdoors" but this is a place you really need to visit while at Hermosillo.  The road up the hill is awful.  It is just atrocious, so go up the hill nice and slow so you dont get a concussion from the rattling of your car.  Once you reach the top though, the sight is amazing.  You get a panoramic view of the whole city.  For all you romantics out there, if you make it there for the sunset you\'ll get to see the incredible light show mother nature puts on!  You will see hues of orange, yellow, blue and purple that even a city boy like myself can\'t help to admit that the earth is an astonishing wonder!  On your way back down make a sharp left that takes you up to the other side of the hill and here you learn why they call it cerro de la campana.  There is a large boulder there that if you throw a rock at it, the boulder rings like a bell! Very cool.  This is a 30 min visit at least, you can take lots of pictures and there is a small cafe.  Hope you enjoy it!

460133143.name: Great city view
460133143.author: a TripAdvisor user
460133143.reviewBody: This is the most accesible highest point in the city. From here you can see almost all the city. Walk around the hill, don\'t just stay on the main viewing point. It\'s really nice and the city has been doing great effort to make it a nice place to visit.

458505825.name: Amazing view
458505825.author: a TripAdvisor user
458505825.reviewBody: I would rate this place as best in Hermosillo. On top, you can view beautiful sun resting in the lap of mountains. A panoramic view of the city in 270 degrees. In the night, city lights make it more amazing.

449916821.name: Nice view of the City at night
449916821.author: a TripAdvisor user
449916821.reviewBody: This provides a panoramic overview of the City in the evening and is a nice place to watch the sun set.

449054366.name: City lights
449054366.author: a TripAdvisor user
449054366.reviewBody: A great view of the city, excellent for taking videos and pictures.\nEasy and safe to reach the top.....

445504029.name: Great view of all of Hermosillo
445504029.author: a TripAdvisor user
445504029.reviewBody: Great to stop by and see the whole city, especially at sunset and night time. It\'s a winding road up and back down but totally worth it!

442147999.name: Nice view and good hiking
442147999.author: a TripAdvisor user
442147999.reviewBody: Nice view of the city, day or night. Try to avoid to go up during the day (10am to 4pm from may to September) to avoid the strong sun. Small parking lot and a nice ice cream store which opens only at night.

429009043.name: Viewing delight
429009043.author: a TripAdvisor user
429009043.reviewBody: Hermosillo is a city in the middle of the Sonora desert \ud83c\udf35 Mexico.  A northern MEXICAN gateway which doesn\'t offer many man made attractions but good to a lot of great natural ones like San Carlos and Kino Bays.  The Cerro de la Campana is a hilltop "mirador" built on a grand rocky hill which rocks sound like bells .  Here you\'ll enjoy The best views of the entire city.  It\'s more impressive at night.

409769493.name: Pretty rings!
409769493.author: a TripAdvisor user
409769493.reviewBody: There is an unsual hill in Hermosillo. Has a great view of the city but that\'s not all. It actually rings. Like the church bells. Pound a rock against another rock and listen to it\'s chimes! Fascinating. Really. Just listen.

389711029.name: Nice View
389711029.author: a TripAdvisor user
389711029.reviewBody: Quick drive up for a nice scenery and great pictures. Close to the city but gets hot quick bring water!

371297981.name: One of the few places to see in Hermosillo
371297981.author: a TripAdvisor user
371297981.reviewBody: Difficult to find the road that takes you up the mountain but then when you do it\'s a winding road up to the lookout spot on the top. Lots of teens and young people on dates, taking in the city lights. Lots of trash everywhere which really was too bad.

366604490.name: Great view of Hermosillo
366604490.author: a TripAdvisor user
366604490.reviewBody: This is a great place to have a full view of Hermosillo. I have done it both at day and night. Both recommended. If you go during the winter take your jacket because when the wind picks up it feels cold.

361766124.name: Mountian View
361766124.author: a TripAdvisor user
361766124.reviewBody: The view is spectacular from any side but be wary of the local municipal police department.  They have mouths to feed and aren\'t afraid to ask you for a donation for whatever random excuse they can come up with as they patrol the area

361226104.name: Cool look over the city
361226104.author: a TripAdvisor user
361226104.reviewBody: It\'s worth the drive up the Cerro de la Campana to take a look out over Hermosillo. This is a solid working town, not such a tourist place. But that\'s what makes it interesting! You can see the old downtown area below you and then the various neighborhoods as they spread out from that. I live in Bahia de Kino, 60 miles away, and it took me a long time to get up this hill, but it was worth it.

361167564.name: A 10 minute visit will do
361167564.author: a TripAdvisor user
361167564.reviewBody: Its a nice place, has a nice view, you can take some cool photos and that\'s it. When I went there the only place that sells water was closed and the sun was really strong. Its worth the visit, yes, but plan a short visit and bring some water.

341331503.name: a quick view and nothing more
341331503.author: a TripAdvisor user
341331503.reviewBody: road not so easy to find, and to drive...which leads you to a parking with an overview of all the city and desert but very dirty place

339829235.name: spectacular views of the city
339829235.author: a TripAdvisor user
339829235.reviewBody: This is a must when visiting Hermosillo, you can enjoy a spectacular view of the city, try to go around sunset.

338650928.name: Great view
338650928.author: a TripAdvisor user
338650928.reviewBody: You practically get a 360\u00b0 view of the entire city. A great place to go to at night time. We were here on a rainy day and lightning looked amazing.

324488231.name: Nice views
324488231.author: a TripAdvisor user
324488231.reviewBody: It is a winding road to the top and from the city it does not look like an overly impressive lookout spot - but once you get to the top the views of the city are actually very nice.  For sure worth doing once.

312576034.name: It offers a good view of city, but not much else
312576034.author: a TripAdvisor user
312576034.reviewBody: You can get a pretty good view, there\'s enough space to move around, even though it can get easily crowded on weekends. It\'s hard to take good pictures at night though, there is a lot of light contamination in the way.

307910212.name: Day or night- this is a MUST during your visit!
307910212.author: a TripAdvisor user
307910212.reviewBody: I wish I had visited here my first day in town... but it was nice to go after I had been to many of the places I could see from the top.  Visiting during daylight gives you a view of the 3 local cathedrals, the governor\'s palace, the museums, the local reservoir/lake and the airport.  This viewpoint was also helpful since I\'m "directionally challenged".  I was able to see many little lizards, butterflies, cacti, and interesting rock formations.\n\nTo me, one of the most amazing things was the handmade road all the way up.  It\'s like cobblestones, but made with smaller rocks.  Unless you are in REALLY good shape- and with a local- I would recommend a taxi to get up/down.  It\'s in the old part of town, so tourists stand out as targets for theft.... I do NOT think it\'s safe to walk (one reviewer talks about being robbed at knifepoint).  Geologists will especially enjoy the rocks here- I\'ve never seen anything like it in the states- beautiful!

307674759.name: Good low impact workout and great city view day or night.
307674759.author: a TripAdvisor user
307674759.reviewBody: You can walk up which takes around 30 mins or drive up except evenings when it gets full. View is great for the whole city, and stargazing at night is also pretty cool.

305227672.name: Great view point
305227672.author: a TripAdvisor user
305227672.reviewBody: Awesome view point. A must for any tourist! Though I recommend catching the view at dusk, the desertic colors will win your heart!

284786648.name: Great Ride!
284786648.author: a TripAdvisor user
284786648.reviewBody: This is a great ride to the top of the cerro.  Such a beautiful view and well worth the time to drive to the top.

281903604.name: Average
281903604.author: a TripAdvisor user
281903604.reviewBody: The only thing to do in the city, hehehehe, also the only place with vistas, so, well, you can drive there or ask a taxi driver to take you there, its ok, and its the only landmark in the place, so enjoy!

261655220.name: Nice view of the city
261655220.author: a TripAdvisor user
261655220.reviewBody: Nice view of the city at night.  Relax and enjoy.  A bit of a windy, bumpy ride up the the hill, but it\'s worth it.

260175109.name: We were robbed at cerro de la campana March 14
260175109.author: a TripAdvisor user
260175109.reviewBody: This place is awesome, very beautiful sunset and night view.  BUT be careful with the people around you.  On the way back from the mountain, we were robbed by two guys holding a knife.  I gave them everything I have, they tried to step in my boyfriend for his backpack, he didnt give up the backpack, so they stepped in and cut his arms and necks, we had a terrible night there, and we drive back to the States immediately next day morning.  I never write comments for any travel place, this time I want to tell everyone be carefully if you want to visit that place.

259869876.name: There\'s not a lot to see in Hermosillo, so add this to your list.
259869876.author: a TripAdvisor user
259869876.reviewBody: Hermosillo is not a tourist destination and as such, there is a very limited number of unique things to do in the city that would appeal to foreigners. If you\'re from out-of-town, or are hosting guests from out-of-town, then Cerro de la Campana should definitely be on your list (along with strolling around downtown at Plaza Sendero). \n\nThe views are beautiful and provide 360 degrees of scenery. Day visits are fun, but to appreciate the beauty of the well-lit city, you\'d do well to visit at night.

238519775.name: Wouldn\'t go out of my way to see it
238519775.author: a TripAdvisor user
238519775.reviewBody: The view is nice but nothing spectacular. Call me jaded, but I saw Machu Picchu already so this did absolutely nothing for me. Again, it\'s nice if you\'re in the neighborhood, otherwise I wouldn\'t go out of my way to go see it.

207532404.name: Great view of Hermosillo
207532404.author: a TripAdvisor user
207532404.reviewBody: Nice if you want to get a view from the very top of the city.  Not really easy to get to and you have to go through some not-so-nice areas of town to get there.

201586590.name: Amazing view
201586590.author: a TripAdvisor user
201586590.reviewBody: I liked it very much, because it gives an amazing view of the city of Hermosillo. There are a lot of families, with children visiting, there are places for parking your car, and small shop for buying drinks.

181961140.name: Scenic
181961140.author: a TripAdvisor user
181961140.reviewBody: Very pretty scenery. We wne tot take a walk after dinner. The weather was gorgeous. It seemed like a nice hang-out spot for the locals, you could see families, couples friends all having a good time.

155940243.name: Excellent all-around city views, day or night time.
155940243.author: a TripAdvisor user
155940243.reviewBody: FINALLY the view point was improved last year. The road leading up to the view point has been refinished, and the parking lot has been paved. Now there is outdoor lighting at the top, and a little place selling refreshments. If you decide to go at dark, try to walk up the hill, to avoid the traffic congestion at the top, since there are no enough parking spots, or go a bit early before sunset, so you can get a spot. And make sure to bring your cameras!

147267687.name: Awesome Scenic views of Hermosillo, looks pretty at night.
147267687.author: a TripAdvisor user
147267687.reviewBody: Plan 2 trips, 1 during the day and one at night, if you are in Hermosillo during summer, even at night is hot up there, beautiful views of the downtown, north, east and south of the city. On the winter, plan to visit during the day since at night is pretty cold and windy.

133860664.name: A good view of the city
133860664.author: a TripAdvisor user
133860664.reviewBody: It\'s not the most amazing view ever, but it\'s a must for this city. If you are in town, don\'t miss doing this, if only just to have a bird view of the city.

130297768.name: Be-careful at night
130297768.author: a TripAdvisor user
130297768.reviewBody: Too many drunk drivers and lack of parking space. If you are American, don\'t even bother to go up at night time.

123782301.name: Breathtaking View of Hermosillo
123782301.author: a TripAdvisor user
123782301.reviewBody: Best place to watch sunrise, sunsets and the general splendor of the city at night. Very family friendly spot. Lots of families with young children, couples (you may even spot wedding pictures being taken), and anyone! There is usually a vendor with snack there in the evening (shortly before sun-down).\nIt is difficult to find the cobble-stone road to get up to the top, but just ask the locals - they are nice and will point you in the right direction.

123130029.name: City View ~ Hermosillo
123130029.author: a TripAdvisor user
123130029.reviewBody: For a great view of the entirety of the City of Hermosillo take the winding road up the mountain. The mountain is near the financial center of the city.  It\'s not a hiking mountain. Definitely and driving-to-the-top excursion.

447370527.name: Great Substance, Needs Some Work
447370527.author: a TripAdvisor user
447370527.reviewBody: Not even a decade old, Musas is a fairly new museum in Hermosillo. I\'ve been visiting the museum ever since it opened several years ago and even in the beginning I realized it never looked quite finished: unfinished construction, bad paint and plaster jobs, inaccessible areas, etc. That\'s always struck me as odd, that for all the spectacle and funding that was put into this museum of the state of Sonora, they seem unable to "finish" or upkeep it well. Last time I visited, I noticed some faulty light fixtures. When we were there, we also noticed one of the large glass entrance doors was completely shattered, so that adds to the sense of General disrepair. Anyway, on to the substance: they have had some excellent exhibits for Sonora, I cannot complain about that? And I\'m sure glad it exists in a city like Hermosillo. However, another downside is that the staff seem unable to tell you what\'s coming next. Once I called to find out what exhibits would go up the following month and they said they didn\'t know, as if there wasn\'t a calendar. They aren\'t great at up-keeping the website either. With just a little more attention to detail, this place could be an amazing monument in the state of Sonora.

itemReviewed.name: Musas Museo De Arte De Sonora

address.streetAddress: Bulevar Vildosola y Avenida Cultura s/n

428501235.name: Just a GREAT ART MUSEUM!!
428501235.author: a TripAdvisor user
428501235.reviewBody: The staff is friendly, the gallery spaces are wonderful and the artwork is well exhibited. The light levels are low in the graphics sections but this is always the case as museum galleries cannot have incoming daylight as this can damage the work. I was just amazed at the high quality of the exhibits for this period, equal to any exhibition in New York or Chicago. Contemporary art in Mexico is way ahead of that found even in Europe so the show was curated with excellence. I want to return as soon as I am able.

itemReviewed.name: Musas Museo De Arte De Sonora

address.streetAddress: Bulevar Vildosola y Avenida Cultura s/n

393738256.name: Small but good collection
393738256.author: a TripAdvisor user
393738256.reviewBody: 4 galleries, all featuring legitimately world-class Mexican artists. The building itself is a nice piece of architecture and the staff were very friendly. Doesn\'t hurt that it\'s free!

itemReviewed.name: Musas Museo De Arte De Sonora

address.streetAddress: Bulevar Vildosola y Avenida Cultura s/n

384947366.name: Small museum
384947366.author: a TripAdvisor user
384947366.reviewBody: Small museum, a few exhibitions. No gift shop. Very inexpensive.  good that  I went, but dont think that I would go back.

itemReviewed.name: Musas Museo De Arte De Sonora

address.streetAddress: Bulevar Vildosola y Avenida Cultura s/n

371297453.name: Beautiful building, but a little light on the actual exhibits
371297453.author: a TripAdvisor user
371297453.reviewBody: This is a gorgeous new museum, but it all seems a little empty. Several gallery spaces weren\'t even open. I went in because they were advertising a Frida Kahlo exhibit but it was quite disappointing - one single painting in a room with a timeline of her life on the wall. I was the only visitor although there were tons of people outside having professional photos (wedding, grad? etc.) done on the grounds.

itemReviewed.name: Musas Museo De Arte De Sonora

address.streetAddress: Bulevar Vildosola y Avenida Cultura s/n

361171295.name: Worth it
361171295.author: a TripAdvisor user
361171295.reviewBody: The tickets are really cheap and the exhibits are really good. They had a  handicraft exhibit that was very nice about Mexican history. Also some modern art and another exhibit about a Mexican serigraphy artist called Posada that was excellent. The building itself is impressive. The only thing missing is a gift shop.

itemReviewed.name: Musas Museo De Arte De Sonora

address.streetAddress: Bulevar Vildosola y Avenida Cultura s/n

327944952.name: A really nice small modern art museum
327944952.author: a TripAdvisor user
327944952.reviewBody: There are some really entertaining and interesting exhibitions to see, but not many, it\'s really cheap and on Sundays they are free, it can be a nice way to spend a couple hours.

itemReviewed.name: Musas Museo De Arte De Sonora

address.streetAddress: Bulevar Vildosola y Avenida Cultura s/n

305228256.name: Modern Art Sometimes
305228256.author: a TripAdvisor user
305228256.reviewBody: This place is awesome when it has a good exposition inside, other than that it doesnt offer much. Their online service is great though, so they will let you know which galleries to visit and when.

itemReviewed.name: Musas Museo De Arte De Sonora

address.streetAddress: Bulevar Vildosola y Avenida Cultura s/n

286733568.name: Exellent place to spend time and enjoy old and new artists!!
286733568.author: a TripAdvisor user
286733568.reviewBody: First of all friendly staffs will tell you and orient you about the museum.  And also they will inform you about up coming events.  I love this place.  Also this museum is free to enter during the weekend...  No money but want some quality time to spend... Here it is!!!!

itemReviewed.name: Musas Museo De Arte De Sonora

address.streetAddress: Bulevar Vildosola y Avenida Cultura s/n

285910022.name: Not an enjoyable experience
285910022.author: a TripAdvisor user
285910022.reviewBody: A nice building but it lacks air conditioning.  There are various pieces of art work but several rooms were empty. It was not an enjoyable experience because of the hot interior of the building.

itemReviewed.name: Musas Museo De Arte De Sonora

address.streetAddress: Bulevar Vildosola y Avenida Cultura s/n

255863766.name: Nice place to spend some time
255863766.author: a TripAdvisor user
255863766.reviewBody: Building itself is really nice and If you have 1 hour you can go there. It is cheap and the exhibitions where ok. \nSaw some disturbing photos but the majority was fine :D\nAlso it is in close proximity to a a mall so you can go for food afterwards.

itemReviewed.name: Musas Museo De Arte De Sonora

address.streetAddress: Bulevar Vildosola y Avenida Cultura s/n

246541592.name: Nice museum
246541592.author: a TripAdvisor user
246541592.reviewBody: We went there on September 30th and loved it. My family saw all the nice paintings and art. If you come at night the building has colorful lights!!

itemReviewed.name: Musas Museo De Arte De Sonora

address.streetAddress: Bulevar Vildosola y Avenida Cultura s/n

656811634.name: Divertido a nivel medio
656811634.author: a TripAdvisor user
656811634.reviewBody: Es un parque de diversi\u00f3n media tiene juegos normales nada extraordinario. En verano tienes que ir ya que se meta el sol de lo contrario los juegos est\u00e1n muy calientes. No recomiendo comprar la poca comida que venden solo compren l\u00edquidos. Tienen buenas \u00e1reas para hacer pi\u00f1atas. Al final los ni\u00f1os si se divierten.

638994057.name: Parque Infantil
638994057.author: a TripAdvisor user
638994057.reviewBody: excelente para un fin de semana para los ni\u00f1os. Muy recomendable el trenecito, un costo de entrada muy accesible.

631401272.name: Opci\u00f3n media para los ni\u00f1os...
631401272.author: a TripAdvisor user
631401272.reviewBody: \u00c9ste parque de atracci\u00f3n est\u00e1 un tanto descuidado, los precios en los negocios de comida son bastante altos, y lo obligan a uno a consumir all\u00ed ya que no puede ingresar con comida o bebida, el trenecito no funcionaba y el agua de la alberca donde est\u00e1 el barco estaba muy sucia, en fin, pienso que puede mejorar y seguir siendo una opci\u00f3n para la gente de aqu\u00ed.

606146847.name: Excelente Diversion
606146847.author: a TripAdvisor user
606146847.reviewBody: Excelente parque renovado en su totalidad. Precios accesibles para todo publico. Recomandable su area de resbaladero. Areas para fiestas.

566334010.name: Un parque infantil accesible y bien cuidado
566334010.author: a TripAdvisor user
566334010.reviewBody: Remodelado y pintado hace poco, el parque infantil ofrece un sinf\u00edn de juegos para que las ni\u00f1as y ni\u00f1os se diviertan a precios accesibles. Ciertamente deber\u00eda de haber becas o reducci\u00f3n de precio a quienes demuestren escasos recursos econ\u00f3micos. La fuente de agua saltarina es muy disfrutada por las y los peque\u00f1os. recomendable para un domingo familiar.

538947216.name: de paseo con los ni\u00f1os
538947216.author: a TripAdvisor user
538947216.reviewBody: atractivo lugar para llevar a los ni\u00f1os de paseos. tiene aparatos mecanicos como los de las ferias a precios muy modicos, incluso hay un pago general para acceder casi a todos los juegos. Cuenta con un trenecito que es muy divertido.

532393451.name: ---muy divertido y seguro para los ni\u00f1os
532393451.author: a TripAdvisor user
532393451.reviewBody: exelente parque infantil de recreaci\u00f3n ---ya que los ni\u00f1os se divierten en grande ---y por ello los Pap\u00e1s estamos agusto y tranquilos ...y los precios son muy accesibles.

531510701.name: Quedo muy padre
531510701.author: a TripAdvisor user
531510701.reviewBody: Quedo muy bonito, con alguna nuevas atracciones, recomendado solo que lleguen temprano porque cierra como a las 6pm y al ser al aire libre en Hermosillo deja poco tiempo para divertirse.

461875201.name: ESPECIAL PARA LLEVAR A LOS NI\u00d1OS
461875201.author: a TripAdvisor user
461875201.reviewBody: Los ni\u00f1os se divierten mucho, hay cantidad de juegos mecanicos, no es caro y hasta puedes hacer tus fiestas infantiles y te la pasas muy bien. Aparte esta recien remodelado.

459836001.name: Buena remodelacion
459836001.author: a TripAdvisor user
459836001.reviewBody: Este lugar fue de los primero parques que tuvo la ciudad de Hermosillo y muchos a\u00f1os duro con la decoracion vieja, fue hasta hace poco que cerraron el parque para darle una buena remodelacion.

452449318.name: da portare la famiglia
452449318.author: a TripAdvisor user
452449318.reviewBody: bel parco non molto grande ma se si ha bambini piccoli ci si passa il tempo , e bene strutturato come parco  ci sarebbero alcune giostre come gli autoscontri che sarebbero da buttare via ormai si vede che hanno fatto la loro storia , per il resto e tutto a posto , e dopo usciti di li davanti si puo trovare il parco madero un piccolo angolo verde

445416909.name: perfecto para para diversion de peque\u00f1os
445416909.author: a TripAdvisor user
445416909.reviewBody: quedo excelente!! despu\u00e9s de la remodelacion, ademas de ser un \u00e1rea muy amena gran ambiente familiar

436834374.name: Muy buena opcion para los ni\u00f1os
436834374.author: a TripAdvisor user
436834374.reviewBody: Hacia a\u00f1os que no visitaba el parque, me sorprendi\u00f3 de grata manera, un lugar limpio, bien cuidado y instalaciones remodeladas. Tiene opciones para todas las edades de ni\u00f1os y por 10 pesos la entrada es una excelente opci\u00f3n, la mejor rese\u00f1a es que a mi hija la encant\u00f3. Lo \u00fanico malo es el horario de 13:00 a 21:00? Deber\u00eda estar abierto desde muy temprano.

424372951.name: Parque infantil
424372951.author: a TripAdvisor user
424372951.reviewBody: Los ni\u00f1os quedaron encantados con la nueva remodelaci\u00f3n, conocen muchos parques y se divirtieron mucho el chapoteadero est\u00e1 muy bonito, todo muy limpio y todo se ve nuevo

398081093.name: Bien
398081093.author: a TripAdvisor user
398081093.reviewBody: Bien pero tiene un "pero", siendo del Sistema Integral de la Familia, y observando los precios, tiene una gran incongruencia, no veo la forma de que se celebren cumplea\u00f1os de ni\u00f1os pobres, bueno ni siquiera de ni\u00f1os de clase media baja, salvo que tuvieran tarifas preferenciales para utilizar los locales para fiestas.

395575940.name: Inversion, Inversion, Inversion!
395575940.author: a TripAdvisor user
395575940.reviewBody: deberian abrirlo a la inversion privada, Hermosillo merece mas lugares para la diversion de los ni\u00f1os. Lo han mantenido y creo que lo han remodelado sin embargo la ciudad y la gente se merece mucho mas. Claro que se puede es falta de vision y de ganas nada mas.

644564474.name: an interesting square
644564474.author: a TripAdvisor user
644564474.reviewBody: an interesting square, well designed on the occasion of 200 and 100 anniversaries of the Mexican revolutions (1810, 1910). The central building is interesting with a large but elegant sculpture with the Nike (victory) crowning the two most important heroes of Mexico. On the first floor it is an important collection of artifacts made by the local Indians that are on sale.

address.streetAddress: Ignacio Comonfort Doctor Hoeffer y Tehuantepec

562345531.name: Nice Hub of Activity with Plenty to See
562345531.author: a TripAdvisor user
562345531.reviewBody:
The Bicentennial Plaza was constructed to commemorate 2010's 200th anniversary of Mexican Independence. The entrance of the building has a large bronze sculpture that features an angel above Miguel Hidalgo, a Roman Catholic priest and revolutionary leader who is called the Father of Mexican independence, and Francisco Madero, who led the 1910 revolution against Porfirio Díaz, and served as president of Mexico from 1911 to 1913.

Unfortunately, we visited in the evening and the Museo de Culturas Populares e Inda-genas de Sonora was not open; it certainly justifies a return visit to spend some time learning more about the nation's history and cultures.

The Lutisuc Gallery, operated by La Cooperativa de Artesanos Indígenas de Sonora, is upstairs and has an amazing selection of indigenous art from the Yaqui, Mayo, Seri, Papago, and four other enduring cultures. 

Warning:  they take credit cards so it can be a "dangerous" place to shop! The prices are very reasonable; I purchased a beautiful Yaqui ceremonial necklace and a small Seri basket.

The plaza is surrounded by several places that are worth spending some time. First, of course, is the stunning Cathedral of the Assumption which rises high above the park. Don't miss the Sonoran Governor's Palace, filled with jaw-dropping murals depicting Mexican history.

address.streetAddress: Ignacio Comonfort Doctor Hoeffer y Tehuantepec

547073463.name: Nice place to visit
547073463.author: a TripAdvisor user
547073463.reviewBody: It is a public square with local business, food, restaurants, you can take your pet here for a walk, there are bars also around it, it\'s a "must" if you visit Hermosillo

address.streetAddress: Ignacio Comonfort Doctor Hoeffer y Tehuantepec

521526105.name: good place for an evennning walk in Hot Hermosillo
521526105.author: a TripAdvisor user
521526105.reviewBody: THey have an ice scream parlor, and a few restaurants & caffe\'s around here.  Close to the central park of the city and around most city and state government offices.  Its a good place to unwind if you are in town for business.  Sometimes they have cultural nights in the area.  Best go in the winter months

address.streetAddress: Ignacio Comonfort Doctor Hoeffer y Tehuantepec

472492491.name: BEST TO VISIT DURING CULTURAL EVENTS
472492491.author: a TripAdvisor user
472492491.reviewBody: Open space plaza surrounded by interesting buildings--nothing special, except then during culture events--which can be very entertaining and fun.

address.streetAddress: Ignacio Comonfort Doctor Hoeffer y Tehuantepec

397053509.name: Weekend nights are great
397053509.author: a TripAdvisor user
397053509.reviewBody: Its a great place to eat something and walk around in the late afternoon, when the heat is lower, you can grab a caffe or an icecream and watch the local artisans sell things.

address.streetAddress: Ignacio Comonfort Doctor Hoeffer y Tehuantepec

365791551.name: Well maintained with historic-vibe
365791551.author: a TripAdvisor user
365791551.reviewBody: It\'s just like any other plaza in most mexican states capital cities. It\'s well maintained and had lots of families walking around. But nothing that you can\'t see on every other city. If you are into buying local ice cones, fried snacks and watching kids making bubbles and playing with toy paper airplanes, you\'ll feel right at home there. It\'s nice enough way to spend a lazy weekend evening. If you are looking for a more cultural experience, better go to a museum.

address.streetAddress: Ignacio Comonfort Doctor Hoeffer y Tehuantepec

601649144.name: So this is where the money goes...
601649144.author: a TripAdvisor user
601649144.reviewBody:
Beautiful building.

Quite a contrast to the regional and rural government buildings.

Methinks a bit of balance is in order.

562358601.name: Incredible Murals Everywhere!
562358601.author: a TripAdvisor user
562358601.reviewBody:
Luckily a friend knew about this place as I would have not even entered the building. It is the Sonoran Governor's Office but is also a work of art. The murals represent various periods of Sonoran history and its many cultures.

Murals cover every wall surrounding the courtyard. Words cannot fully describe the overwhelming intensity of the scenes.

The Palacio is adjacent to Plaza Zaragosa so a visit here can be combined, as we did, with time at the Hermosillo Cathedral and Lutisuc Gallery of Indigenous Art. Two museums are nearby but were closed as it was already late afternoon when we visited.

259869314.name: Free, fun, and safe!
259869314.author: a TripAdvisor user
259869314.reviewBody: There\'s not much for foreigners to do in Hermosillo. It\'s most certainly not a tourist destination. However, should you find yourself on a visit to Hermosillo, then visiting the city center is a must. The plaza is well maintained and safe. There are numerous stores and restaurants in close proximity. My wife and I regularly visit the plaza on Sunday evenings just to stroll around and enjoy the sights and smells.

666140614.name: Beisbol!!
666140614.author: a TripAdvisor user
666140614.reviewBody: muy buena opci\u00f3n de oto\u00f1o en Hermosillo, puedes disfrutar un partido de b\u00e9isbol y comer de todos tipo de antojos

651518519.name: El mejor ambiente!!
651518519.author: a TripAdvisor user
651518519.reviewBody: Sin duda el mejor ambiente beisbolero, cuenta con tienda de souvenirs propios de los Naranjeros (jerseys, gorras, llaveros, chamarras), restaurantes de comida regional (carne asada, burros, quesadillas), vendedores ambulantes de snaks (cacahuates, duros con chile, palomitas, papitas), bebidas heladas (Cheve!) y todo para pasar una velada agradable con la familia, pareja o amigos.

645236099.name: CALIDAD
645236099.author: a TripAdvisor user
645236099.reviewBody: Excelente experiencia tuve la oportunidad de ver un juego de Naranjeros de Hermosillo vs Yaquis de Obregon, en el cual gano los naranjeros el ambiente agradable el estadio con buena iluminaci\u00f3n buenas pantallas, c\u00f3modos asientos y una feria de comida , venta de cerveza , todo lo necesario para pasarla bien

640926899.name: noche beisbolera
640926899.author: a TripAdvisor user
640926899.reviewBody: excelente estadio de beisbol, sede del equipo naranjeros de Hermosillo. muy buen equipamiento , gran ambiente, para noches de diversi\u00f3n de los amantes del beisbol.

638994466.name: El mejor Beisbol
638994466.author: a TripAdvisor user
638994466.reviewBody: Para ir a disfrutar del rey de los deportes con un excelente ambiente familiar. Un poco cara la entrada y los alimentos comparado con otras plazas.

633847710.name: Como de Las Mayores...
633847710.author: a TripAdvisor user
633847710.reviewBody:
Como aficionado del béisbol y aprovechando mi estadía en Hermosillo, TENÍA que asistir al estadio a un juego de los Naranjeros. me tomó 20 min. llegar al estadio desde el hotel, es fácil llegar con ayuda del GPS. Me sorprendió que no hay cobro oficial por el uso del estacionamiento, o al menos en esa parte no, pero sí una persona que estaba señalando dónde poder estacionarte me dijo que "si quería cooperar con alguna cuota voluntaria" por lo tanto, para evitar algún daño "fortuito" a la camioneta, le di $20.

Ubiqué taquilla, los precios la verdad son muy accesibles para un lugar como ese, $310 el boleto para un lugar atrás del dugout de 3ra. base, la cerveza, $35 sencilla, $70 doble, boneless a $100.

La vista hacia el campo excelente, el campo impecable, el estadio en general una belleza y para terminar, Naranjeros ganó 8 - 0 a Charros de Jalisco.

632200854.name: Estadio de primer mundo
632200854.author: a TripAdvisor user
632200854.reviewBody: El estadio Sonora del equipo naranjeros de Hermosillo esta espectacular, muy buen ambiente, muy recomendable ir a visitarlo cuando juegue noranjeros de local.

631641226.name: Buen lugar para ver tu deporte favorito.
631641226.author: a TripAdvisor user
631641226.reviewBody: Cada temporada de beisbol, asistimos con familia y amigos para apoyar al equipo de casa. Grandes instalaciones y variedad de comida, solo que por ser temporada los precios son algo elevados, sobre todo si vas con ni\u00f1os, ya que a todo le suben los precios incluso en algunos mas del 50% que lo que cuestan en un local normal de comida

631503593.name: Muuy divertido
631503593.author: a TripAdvisor user
631503593.reviewBody: Es un estadio muy padre, encuentras de todo lo que busques, comida, recuerdos, bebidas, incluso excelentes fotos, si te gusta el beisbol no puedes faltar.

449920827.name: Worth to stop by if you are heading toward San Carlos
449920827.author: a TripAdvisor user
449920827.reviewBody: It is helpful to appreciate this attraction if you understand the Mexican story about the miracle of virgin, Guadalupe.  If you do not know the story you should GOOGLE the history first.  The virgin Guadalupe is a big part of Mexican culture and this attraction is a testament to the impact on the Mexican culture.

429666903.name: Beautifully painted
429666903.author: a TripAdvisor user
429666903.reviewBody: It is a great sight for any traveler, it brings back memories of traveling with my mother. Someone maintains the mural very nice.

340277504.name: Donde esta?  Where is it?
340277504.author: a TripAdvisor user
340277504.reviewBody: We drove for an hour looking for this place today and could not find it.  Nosotros manejamos por una hora y no pudimos encontrarlo.

201586828.name: Sacral place
201586828.author: a TripAdvisor user
201586828.reviewBody: Very nice place, with a panting of virgencita on the wall, people are coming to thank for all the miracles. It is situated in the mountain, so you will have to take stairs and walk for a while, so maybe not so good attraction for old people. there are small souvenir place, and you can buy some snacks. entrence of the car - 20 pesos

130297854.name: Okay
130297854.author: a TripAdvisor user
130297854.reviewBody: Dry and nothing in particular. Make sure to bring your water and eat well before you go up.  Not a turist attraction.

127696468.name: Stairs to the Virgin Guadalupe
127696468.author: a TripAdvisor user
127696468.reviewBody: Enjoyed this quick stop on the way out of Hermosillo.  A small climb up the stairs to view the painted picture of the Virgin Guadalupe. There are hundreds of requests to the Virgin and shrines set up. A beatiful site to see.

118792153.name: Cerrito de la Virgen - A Spiritual Climb
118792153.author: a TripAdvisor user

571340539.name: Dazzling murals
571340539.author: a TripAdvisor user
571340539.reviewBody: Worth the effort to spend time in this gem.  The accompanying photo is typical of the expressive colors.  The gift shop has authentically made,  reasonably priced souvenirs.

itemReviewed.name: Museo de Culturas Populares e Inda-genas de Sonora

472491149.name: PHOTOS AND ARTIFACTS OF THE YAQUI AND MAYO INDIANS
472491149.author: a TripAdvisor user
472491149.reviewBody: If you are versed on the local Yaqui and Mayo Indian tribes of the region, you might be a little disappointed. But if this is all new to you, you will enjoy learning about the local Indian tribles

itemReviewed.name: Museo de Culturas Populares e Inda-genas de Sonora

307922301.name: Air conditioned with changing exhibits
307922301.author: a TripAdvisor user
307922301.reviewBody: Exhibits change regularly here- VERY interesting!!  There are cards in Spanish that explain what the pictures are of.  Nearby in the Bicentennial Plaza there is an amazing store (Lutisuc Association Cultural) on the second floor (across from the suspended golden angel) where you can buy beautiful handmade products from the native peoples  (Mayan, Yaqui, Seri, and others).  The ladies in the store speak English and explain about how the items are made and the cultures (lutisuc@hotmail.com). That store is open 9-1 and 4-8 Mon-Fri and Sunday 4-8PM.

itemReviewed.name: Museo de Culturas Populares e Inda-genas de Sonora

305227906.name: Indiginous history
305227906.author: a TripAdvisor user
305227906.reviewBody: Full of history and off the beaten path information. Though a tour guide would be appreciated. Visit even if you have a short amount of time, it\'s a small place.

itemReviewed.name: Museo de Culturas Populares e Inda-genas de Sonora
